doc:
Randy Becker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randy_Becker 0 Randy Becker is an American stage, television and film actor.Becker is best known for such productions as Love! Valour! Compassion!, "Lie Down with Dogs" movie in 1995, Sabrina and Jack Jill. In 1995 Becker had an epileptic seizure off stage while performing in the play Love! Valour! Compassion! Becker's understudy finished the performance. Randy_Becker is an_American_stage_,_television_and_film_actor.Becker is_best_known for such_productions as Love ! Valour ! Compassion ! , " Lie_Down with Dogs "_movie in 1995 , Sabrina_and_Jack_ . In 1995_Becker had an_epileptic_seizure off stage while performing in the_play_Love ! Valour ! Compassion ! Becker 's_understudy finished the_performance .
